templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE article [ <!ENTITY chap1 SYSTEM "chap1.xml"> <!ENTITY references SYSTEM "references.xml"> ]> <article xmlns="http://docbook.org/ns/docbook" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"> <info> <title>${cursor}</title> <date>Month, Year</date> <author> <orgname class="corporation">Some Company</orgname> </author> <abstract> <para> This is part of the abstract. </para> </abstract> </info>
<section xml:id="sec.chap1">&chap1;</section> &references; </article>

template.description: Begin a new section of a DocBook article
template.name: DocBook Section
